Member Function Documentation

◆ hand_pre() [1/2]

def pybaccarat.baccaratsystems.ValSys.hand_pre (   self,
  hand_num 
)

ValSystem rules:

  1. if board 2 last entry is in row 1, play chop else play same
  2. overrides rule 1. If 4+ in a row on board 0, play same

◆ hand_pre() [2/2]

def pybaccarat.baccaratsystems.ValSys.hand_pre (   self,
  hand_num 
)

ValSystem rules:

  1. if board 2 last entry is in row 1, play chop else play same
  2. overrides rule 1. If 4+ in a row on board 0, play same
